From this, I see that Jacques Laffite is one driver who retired due to engine. Another is Nigel Mansell in row 15 with "engine" as the reason.

So there are at least two drivers: Jacques Laffite and Nigel Mansell who retired because of engine issues. That would make the claim true, right? Because it says "1 of the 2 drivers," but actually, there might be more than two. Wait, let me count again.

- Row 7: engine (Nigel Mansell)
- Others don't mention engine, except:

Wait no, in row 11: Derek Warwick's reason is overheating. So only two drivers: Jacques Laffite and Nigel Mansell retired because of engine.

Therefore, the claim is correct because Jacques Laffite is indeed one of the two drivers who retired due to engine issues.
